Description_lang: Increases the radius of Arcane Explosion, Flamestrike, and Blizzard by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the radius of Arcane Explosion, Flamestrike, and Blizzard by 25%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 25% el radio de la Deflagración Arcana, del Fogonazo y de la Ventisca.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 25% o raio da Explosão Arcana, do Golpe Flamejante e da Nevasca.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den Wirkungsradius von 'Arkane Explosion', 'Flammenstoß' und 'Blizzard' um 25%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the radius of Arcane Explosion, Flamestrike, and Blizzard by 25%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta un 25% el radio de la Deflagración Arcana, del Fogonazo y de la Ventisca.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente de 25% le rayon d'effet d'Explosion des Arcanes, de Choc de flammes et de Blizzard.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta il raggio di Esplosione Arcana, Colonna di Fuoco e Tormenta del 25%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличение радиуса действия заклинаний "Чародейский взрыв", "Огненный столб" и "Снежная буря" на 25%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신비한 폭발과 불기둥, 눈보라의 반경이 25%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使魔爆術、烈焰風暴和暴風雪的影響半徑增加25%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使魔爆术、烈焰风暴和暴风雪的攻击范围增加25%。
